.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task ResetAsync(valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed

Docs.summary: Asynchronously reset the state of all messages marked for deletion.
Docs.remarks: Messages marked for deletion are not actually deleted until the session is cleanly disconnected (see ).

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract bool SupportsUids { get; }
.property instance bool SupportsUids

Docs.summary: Get whether or not the service supports referencing messages by UIDs.
Docs.value: true if supports uids; otherwise, false.

remarks.para: Not all servers support referencing messages by UID, so this property should be checked before using and .
If the server does not support UIDs, then all methods that take UID arguments along with and will fail.
